meanings.definition: A navigational instrument that uses a gyroscope to find true north.
meanings.sent1: Sailors rely on gyrocompasses to show them which way is north at sea.
meanings.sent2: The captain adjusted the gyrocompasses to ensure the ship stayed on course.
meanings.sent3: The curious monkey mistook the gyrocompasses for a toy and tried to play with it.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition acted as a gyrocompass, always guiding her towards the right decisions.
meanings.sent5: The gyrocompasses hummed softly, pointing the way through the stormy night.
